document.full_text: faced with a legal and media onslaught, dominique strauss-kahn is pulling together a crack team of investigators, former spies and media advisers to fight back against charges he sexually assaulted a hotel chambermaid.
document.title: strauss-kahn assembles crisis team to fight back
lines_and_colors: faced with a legal and media onslaught, dominique strauss-kahn is pulling together a crack team of investigators, former spies and media advisers to fight back against charges he sexually assaulted a hotel chambermaid.
